name: Destination
subtext: Its a niche product selling website which is an appartment selling platform. It is created with MERN Stack technology
description: Its a niche product selling website which is an appartment selling platform. It is created with MERN Stack technology. A service website has an admin panel to add or remove services. Admin can manage all of the orders of users and be able to make more admin. The registered user can leave feedback which will be displayed on the home page.
tools: ReactJS, MongoDB, NodeJS, ExpressJS, Javascript, HTML, CSS

name: Travellers
subtext: Its a website of travel agency. It is created with ReactJs technology
description: Its a website of travel agency. It is created with ReactJs technology. A traveling website has firebase authentication. A new service can be added by a user while he/she is registered. Registered users can make orders and are permitted to manage his/her own orders.
tools: ReactJS, MongoDB, NodeJS, ExpressJS, Javascript, HTML, CSS

name: Delta Care Hospital
subtext: A hospital website. It is created with ReactJs technology
description: A hospital website. It is created with ReactJs technology. A clinical website has Firebase authentication including Google, email login, and registration. Regular users can see the list of doctors while only registered users can make appointments. The unregistered users can visit the features but are not allowed to see them in detail.

name: Skill Advisor
subtext: An online learning platform having a lot of courses. It is created with ReactJs technology
description: An online learning platform having a lot of courses. It is created with ReactJs technology. This a functional website having some features. The users will find various courses here. He/she can check all the instructors list with their basic information.

name: Food Hub Restaurant
subtext: A restaurant website. It is structured with HTML, CSS, Javascript and Bootstrap.
description: A restaurant website. It is structured with HTML, CSS, Javascript and Bootstrap 5. The website is completely responsive for all the devices. Its a modern layout having some beautiful color and photos. Its has almost all the section usually required for a restaurant website

name: Pro Music
subtext: A website for music management. This one is created with HTML, CSS, Javascript.
description: A website for music management. This one is created with HTML, CSS, Javascript. The admin can select his/her desired musician depends on the budget. The local storage is used to save the data to calculate.
